channel.title: The Jackson Lab
channel.description: AI-Driven Chemical Theory for Soft Materials

item.title: Group Trip to Curtis Orchard
item.description: October 2025 – Group Trip to Curtis Orchard. First pumpkin carving for some, better stick to coding than art?

item.title: Archana Verma wins Women in Chemical Engineering Travel Award
item.description: October 2025 – Archana Verma wins a Women in Chemical Engineering Travel Award to go to the 2025 AIChE Annual meeting in November. Congratulations Archana!

item.title: Jackson Group Canoe Trip 2025
item.description: June 2025 – The Jackson Group Canoe Trip 2025 at Sugar Valley Canoes! 10 miles of paddling, our longest yet.

item.title: Sofia Sivilotti wins ACS Undergraduate Award
item.description: June 2025 – Former undergraduate researcher Sofia Sivilotti wins the Chemistry Department’s ACS Undergraduate Award in Physical Chemistry. Congratulations Sofia!

item.title: Charlie Maier defends thesis and graduates
item.description: May 2025 – Charlie Maier defends his thesis and becomes the second Ph.D graduate of the Jackson group. Charlie will be joining the University of Notre Dame as a Scientific Artificial Intelligence Postdoctoral Fellow. Congrats Charlie!

item.title: Group volunteers for outreach at St. Elmo Brady Academy
item.description: May 2025 – The group volunteers for outreach with 3rd graders at the St. Elmo Brady Academy to learn about temperature with homemade thermometers!

item.title: Archana receives GIANT Student Leadership Award
item.description: May 2025 – Archana is part of a team which received a Grassroots Initiatives to Address Needs Together (GIANT) Student Leadership Award for their contributions to the development and upcoming research initiative on the weSTEM conference. Congrats Archana!

item.title: Eliza and Anna win prestigious fellowships
item.description: April 2025 – Eliza Asani wins a DOE Computational Sciences Graduate Fellowship, and Anna DeBernardo wins the NSF Graduate Fellowship Program Award. Congrats both!

item.title: David Friday defends thesis and graduates
item.description: March 2025 – David Friday defends his thesis and becomes the first Ph.D graduate of the Jackson group. Congratulations! David will be joining Lilly!

item.title: Viviana Palacio Betancur wins Beckman Institute Postdoctoral Fellowship
item.description: February 2025 – Dr. Viviana Palacio Betancur wins a prestigious Beckman Institute Postdoctoral Fellowship. Congrats Viviana!
